p: Chikungunya virus SL11131 (AB455493) and SL10571 (AB455494), which are members of the ECSA genotype, were passaged in Vero cells. These viruses were isolated from serum of a Japanese patient returning from Sri Lanka in 2006 [ 23], who provided written informed consent for their use. CHIKV-S27 which is an African prototype (NC_004162) also belongs to the ECSA genotype. These viruses were provided by Dr. Takasaki (National Institute of Infectious Diseases, Japan) and stored in -80 oC freezer at a biosafety level (BSL)-3 until use.
